catentdesc.name: Albini Tots Girl'S Cotton Short sleeve Shirt
catentdesc.shortdescription: Girls ' short sleeve cotton button-up shirt with pretty floral print
catentdesc.longdescription: A shirt as pretty and sweet as she is! This flowered-print cotton shirt from Albini works well for everyday wear or for more special occasions.

catentdesc.name: Gusso Kidswear Girls' Balloons Graphic T-Shirt
catentdesc.shortdescription: Girls ' short sleeve balloons graphic t-shirt
catentdesc.longdescription: Durable white cotton short-sleeve t-shirt. A cheerful bright balloon print adds charm and whimsy to this comfortable Gusso top.

catentdesc.name: Gusso Kidswear Velour Hoodie
catentdesc.longdescription: Casual cuteness that 's perfect for playtime. This soft and comfortable velour hoodie, with a zippered front and kangaroo pockets, allows kids to move and play in comfort and style.

catentdesc.name: Versatil Cotton/Polyester Cable Knit Cardigan
catentdesc.longdescription: Keep warm and look great, too! Versatil 's pretty polyester-cotton knit cardigan, with button-ip front, is sure to become a favorite. Holds its shape well.

catentdesc.name: Albini Tots T-Shirt with Cotton Trim
catentdesc.shortdescription: Girls ' colorful t-shirt with collared cotton trim
catentdesc.longdescription: Albini Tots offers this t-shirt with a dressy cotton trim. Th faux two-piece look provides a preppy flair for a young girl with a real sense of style. Has the comfort of a t-shirt, but with a cotton button-up blouse collar, sleeve cuffs, and bottom trim to dress up the look.

catentdesc.name: Hermitage Sweater with Ruffled Neckline
catentdesc.shortdescription: Girls ' long sleeve sweater with ruffled neckline
catentdesc.longdescription: Stay fashionably warm in the chill of winter! This cotton-nylon blend sweater from Hermitage, with a stylish ruffled neck looks pretty and feels nice and cozy.

catentdesc.name: Albini Tots Cotton Tunic Shirt
catentdesc.shortdescription: Girls ' long sleeve cotton tunic shirt
catentdesc.longdescription: Crisp and classic, with a feminine flair. Albini Tots offers this cute cotton long sleeve tunic that 's perfect for special occasions, or for little girls who like a dressy every day look.

catentdesc.name: Hermitage Cable Knit Cardigan
catentdesc.shortdescription: Girls ' button-up cap sleeve cable knit cardigan
catentdesc.longdescription: Cute & spunky! She 'll stay warm and comfortable in this adorable cotton-wool blend sweater with cap-sleeves. Bright color and big buttons give this sweater a fashionable sense of style.

catentdesc.name: Hermitage Cardigan with Tie Belt
catentdesc.shortdescription: Girls ' button-up cable knit cardigan with tie belt
catentdesc.longdescription: Warm and wonderful. She 'll look so cute in this cozy knit cardigan, with a stylish belted waist, available in a range of earth tones. This Hermitage sweater is made of a cotton-polyester blend.

catentdesc.name: Gusso Graphic T-Shirt
catentdesc.longdescription: She 'll look fresh and pretty as Springtime! This pretty orange graphic t-shirt from Gusso Kidswear, with its flower graphic, is adorable and comfortable! Made of machine washable cotton, so it 's easy to care for.

catentdesc.name: Albini Tunic Shirt
catentdesc.longdescription: Crisp and classic, with a feminine flair. Albini Tots offers this cute cotton tunic that 's perfect for special occasions, or for girls who like a dressed-up look every day.

catentdesc.name: Versatil Comfortable T-Shirt
catentdesc.longdescription: Practical and pretty. This high-quality casual t-shirt from Versatil is great for everyday wear. Made from comfortable and durable cotton jersey .

catentdesc.name: Gusso Plaid Hoodie
catentdesc.longdescription: Warm comfort and a classic look. This fleece-lined, Multi-color hoodie from Gusso Kidswear will keep her cozy and warm, and looking sharp! Made of a cotton-polyester blend, the hoodie is durable and machine washable.

catentdesc.name: Versatil Zippered Cardigan
catentdesc.longdescription: Check out this adorable cable knit zippered cardigan from Versatil. Made of soft cotton, so it doesn 't feel the least bit scratchy. Just want every girl needs to keep warm and cozy.

catentdesc.name: Hermitage Graphic T-Shirt
catentdesc.longdescription: T-shirt with a pretty butterfly print that sparkles as brightly as her personality! This adorable t-shirt from Hermitage, offers comfort and style for the young fashion trend-setter. The t-shirt is made of 100% cotton.

catentdesc.name: Gusso Fleece Hoodie
catentdesc.longdescription: Cuddle up and stay warm in this comfortable hoodie with a cinch waist from Gusso Kidswear. Its soft cotton fleece lining and kangaroo pockets will let her get out and enjoy playing in the cool air, but still stay cozy and warm.
